page.title: 14COLLINS FARM HIGH LAVER
page.content: Collins Farm is a 400 acre farm in High Laver,near Moreton. Mr.Collins showed us round his farm.The average size of field is 40 acres.He grows wheat, barley, potatoes and grass. The potato crop covers 76 acres,barley 120 acres and wheat 176 acres.These are rotated every 5 years. The balance is made up of grass,farm buildings and yards. Potatoes are his most profitable crop but they are also the most risky because the heavy Essex soils do not guarantee consistent yields. The average annual yield is 20 tonnes per acre. We saw where , and how the potatoes are cleaned, sorted, graded and bagged,all by one machine. The bagged potatoes are sold to the London market.
